meta.description: Optimize the number of jars used to ship at least 100000 ml of jam with constraints on jar sizes.

sets.name: JAR_TYPES
sets.description: Types of jars used by the company.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each jar type in ml.

vars.name: num_jars
vars.description: Number of jars of each type to be used.

objective.name: min_total_jars
objective.description: Minimize the total number of jars used.

constraints.name: large_jar_limit
constraints.description: The number of large jars cannot exceed the number of small jars.

constraints.name: minimum_jam_requirement
constraints.description: The total amount of jam shipped must be at least 100000 ml.
